page.title: 041981 Census Information
page.content: We are taking the figures for {Hexhamshire Low Quarter}, which includes most but not all of our area. {Population}: 229 Schoolchildren:29 12.6% Working age: 104 45.4% Retired :80 34.9% {Number of houses}: 93 2 of these had no inside WC,and 1 had no bath (a big improvement since 1971) Only 2 were Council property. {Car Ownership per household:} 2 or more cars: 25 (30.5%) 1 car: 41 (50%) No car: 16 (19.5%9) (These figures are not surprising as there are only 2 buses to Hexham per week, apart from the School bus, and there is no shop in the area!) {Since 1981}, there have been several new houses built,and the population has increased slightly.
